# II. CÃ¡c nhÃ³m tÃ­nh nÄƒng chÃ­nh

> `Vnstock` giÃºp rÃºt ngáº¯n thá»i gian xá»­ lÃ½ dá»¯ liá»‡u, há»— trá»£ há»c táº­p, nghiÃªn cá»©u vÃ  xÃ¢y dá»±ng há»‡ thá»‘ng phÃ¢n tÃ­ch giao dá»‹ch tÃ i chÃ­nh má»™t cÃ¡ch hiá»‡u quáº£ â€“ khÃ´ng chá»‰ lÃ  má»™t cÃ´ng cá»¥ trÃ­ch xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u, mÃ  lÃ  ná»n táº£ng Ä‘á»ƒ phÃ¡t triá»ƒn giáº£i phÃ¡p Ä‘áº§u tÆ° cÃ¡ nhÃ¢n thÃ´ng minh. ThÆ° viá»‡n Ä‘Æ°á»£c thiáº¿t káº¿ dá»… dÃ ng sá»­ dá»¥ng vÃ  tÃ­ch há»£p vÃ o cÃ¡c há»‡ thá»‘ng phÃ¢n tÃ­ch, nghiÃªn cá»©u, trang tá»•ng quan, hoáº·c bot chá»©ng khoÃ¡n.

1. **Truy xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u qua API Ä‘Æ¡n giáº£n**  
  Dá»… dÃ ng truy cáº­p dá»¯ liá»‡u thÃ´ng qua cÃ¡c hÃ m Python thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, giÃºp tÃ­ch há»£p nhanh vÃ o há»‡ thá»‘ng phÃ¢n tÃ­ch tá»± Ä‘á»™ng hoáº·c bot giao dá»‹ch.

2. **Dá»¯ liá»‡u cá»• phiáº¿u**  
  GiÃ¡ cá»• phiáº¿u thá»i gian thá»±c, dá»¯ liá»‡u lá»‹ch sá»­, chá»‰ sá»‘ tÃ i chÃ­nh vÃ  thÃ´ng tin doanh nghiá»‡p cá»§a cÃ¡c mÃ£ niÃªm yáº¿t.

3. **Bá»™ lá»c cá»• phiáº¿u**  
  Há»— trá»£ lá»c cá»• phiáº¿u theo tiÃªu chÃ­ tÃ i chÃ­nh, ká»¹ thuáº­t hoáº·c thá»‹ trÆ°á»ng Ä‘á»ƒ phá»¥c vá»¥ phÃ¢n tÃ­ch.

4. **Chá»‰ sá»‘ thá»‹ trÆ°á»ng (Index)**  
  Theo dÃµi hiá»‡u suáº¥t cÃ¡c chá»‰ sá»‘ trong nÆ°á»›c (VNIndex, HNXIndex, UPCOM) vÃ  má»™t sá»‘ chá»‰ sá»‘ quá»‘c táº¿.

5. **Chá»©ng quyá»n (CW)**  
  ThÃ´ng tin chá»©ng quyá»n bao gá»“m giÃ¡, ngÃ y Ä‘Ã¡o háº¡n, tá»• chá»©c phÃ¡t hÃ nh vÃ  tráº¡ng thÃ¡i thá»‹ trÆ°á»ng.

6. **Kim loáº¡i quÃ½**  
  Cáº­p nháº­t giÃ¡ vÃ ng trong nÆ°á»›c vÃ  tháº¿ giá»›i.

7. **Há»£p Ä‘á»“ng tÆ°Æ¡ng lai (PhÃ¡i sinh)**  
  Dá»¯ liá»‡u há»£p Ä‘á»“ng tÆ°Æ¡ng lai nhÆ° VN30F vÃ  cÃ¡c ká»³ háº¡n giao dá»‹ch.

8. **Quá»¹ Ä‘áº§u tÆ° (ETF & Quá»¹ má»Ÿ)**  
  ThÃ´ng tin vá» danh má»¥c, hiá»‡u suáº¥t vÃ  cÃ¡c chá»‰ sá»‘ liÃªn quan cá»§a quá»¹ Ä‘áº§u tÆ°.

9. **TrÃ¡i phiáº¿u**  
  Dá»¯ liá»‡u trÃ¡i phiáº¿u ChÃ­nh phá»§ vÃ  doanh nghiá»‡p bao gá»“m ká»³ háº¡n, lÃ£i suáº¥t vÃ  khá»‘i lÆ°á»£ng giao dá»‹ch.

10. **Ngoáº¡i há»‘i (Forex)**  
  Tá»· giÃ¡ cáº­p nháº­t theo thá»i gian thá»±c cá»§a cÃ¡c cáº·p tiá»n tá»‡ phá»• biáº¿n.

11. **Tiá»n Ä‘iá»‡n tá»­ (Crypto)**  
  GiÃ¡ cáº£ vÃ  biáº¿n Ä‘á»™ng thá»‹ trÆ°á»ng cá»§a cÃ¡c loáº¡i tiá»n Ä‘iá»‡n tá»­ lá»›n.

12. **Tin tá»©c & sá»± kiá»‡n tÃ i chÃ­nh**  
  Tá»± Ä‘á»™ng cáº­p nháº­t tin tá»©c, cÃ´ng bá»‘ thÃ´ng tin doanh nghiá»‡p vÃ  lá»‹ch sá»± kiá»‡n thá»‹ trÆ°á»ng.

---

# III. TuyÃªn bá»‘ miá»…n trá»« trÃ¡ch nhiá»‡m

> Dá»± Ã¡n **Vnstock** Ä‘Æ°á»£c phÃ¡t triá»ƒn nháº±m phá»¥c vá»¥ **má»¥c Ä‘Ã­ch nghiÃªn cá»©u vÃ  sá»­ dá»¥ng cÃ¡ nhÃ¢n**. Dá»¯ liá»‡u cung cáº¥p cÃ³ thá»ƒ khÃ´ng Ä‘áº§y Ä‘á»§, khÃ´ng liÃªn tá»¥c hoáº·c sai lá»‡ch so vá»›i thá»±c táº¿, do Ä‘Ã³ khÃ´ng khuyáº¿n nghá»‹ **sá»­ dá»¥ng cho má»¥c Ä‘Ã­ch giao dá»‹ch thá»±c táº¿, thuáº­t toÃ¡n Ä‘áº§u tÆ°, hoáº·c ra quyáº¿t Ä‘á»‹nh tÃ i chÃ­nh** khi báº¡n khÃ´ng hiá»ƒu rÃµ.

CÃ¡c tÃ¡c giáº£ **khÃ´ng chá»‹u trÃ¡ch nhiá»‡m Ä‘á»‘i vá»›i báº¥t ká»³ tá»•n tháº¥t hay thiá»‡t háº¡i nÃ o** phÃ¡t sinh tá»« viá»‡c sá»­ dá»¥ng dá»¯ liá»‡u hoáº·c mÃ£ nguá»“n nÃ y, bao gá»“m nhÆ°ng khÃ´ng giá»›i háº¡n: sai lá»‡ch dá»¯ liá»‡u, máº¥t mÃ¡t tÃ i chÃ­nh, hoáº·c sá»­ dá»¥ng sai má»¥c Ä‘Ã­ch.

**Vnstock khÃ´ng cung cáº¥p tÆ° váº¥n Ä‘áº§u tÆ° hay tÃ­n hiá»‡u giao dá»‹ch**. NgÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng hoÃ n toÃ n tá»± chá»‹u trÃ¡ch nhiá»‡m khi sá»­ dá»¥ng dá»± Ã¡n.

# IV. ğŸ”‘ Giáº¥y phÃ©p sá»­ dá»¥ng (License)

`Vnstock` Ä‘Æ°á»£c phÃ¡t hÃ nh theo giáº¥y phÃ©p tuá»³ chá»‰nh hÆ°á»›ng Ä‘áº¿n cÃ¡ nhÃ¢n, khÃ´ng dÃ nh cho má»¥c Ä‘Ã­ch thÆ°Æ¡ng máº¡i. Quyá»n sá»­ dá»¥ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c quy Ä‘á»‹nh cá»¥ thá»ƒ trong [giáº¥y phÃ©p](LICENSE.md) kÃ¨m theo. Náº¿u báº¡n hoáº·c tá»• chá»©c báº¡n Ä‘ang lÃ m viá»‡c muá»‘n sá»­ dá»¥ng Vnstock cÃ³ thá»ƒ liÃªn há»‡ tÃ¡c giáº£ Ä‘á»ƒ hiá»ƒu rÃµ pháº¡m vi sá»­ dá»¥ng vÃ  Ä‘Æ°á»£c cáº¥p phÃ©p chÃ­nh thá»©c.

Khi sá»­ dá»¥ng Vnstock trong dá»± Ã¡n cá»§a mÃ¬nh, báº¡n cáº§n trÃ­ch dáº«n thÃ´ng tin vá» tÃ¡c giáº£ vÃ  dá»± Ã¡n theo hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n cá»§a Vnstock.

## 8.1. CÃ i Ä‘áº·t 

Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ cÃ i Ä‘áº·t thÆ° viá»‡n báº£n phÃ¡t hÃ nh á»•n Ä‘á»‹nh qua PyPI vá»›i cÃ¢u lá»‡nh sau:

```bash

```

Báº¡n cÅ©ng cÃ³ thá»ƒ cÃ i Ä‘áº·t báº£n phÃ¡t hÃ nh thá»­ nghiá»‡m trÃªn Github vá»›i cÃ¢u lá»‡nh:

```bash

```

## 8.2. Náº¡p thÆ° viá»‡n

Báº¡n cáº§n náº¡p thÆ° viá»‡n vÃ o mÃ´i trÆ°á»ng Python thÃ´ng qua giao diá»‡n Jupyter Notebook hoáº·c Terminal Ä‘á»ƒ cÃ³ thá»ƒ gá»i vÃ  sá»­ dá»¥ng cÃ¡c hÃ m Ä‘Æ°á»£c cung cáº¥p.

CÃ³ 4 cÃ¡ch náº¡p thÆ° viá»‡n vÃ o mÃ´i trÆ°á»ng lÃ m viá»‡c nhÆ° sau:

### 8.2.1. Náº¡p thÃ´ng qua giao diá»‡n lÃ m viá»‡c chÃ­nh

Giao diá»‡n lÃ m viá»‡c chÃ­nh cho phÃ©p chuyá»ƒn Ä‘á»•i nguá»“n vÃ  chá»‰ cáº§n khai bÃ¡o tÃªn mÃ£ khi khá»Ÿi Ä‘á»™ng. Cáº¥u trÃºc nÃ y phÃ¹ há»£p khi phÃ¢n tÃ­ch xuyÃªn suá»‘t 1 mÃ£ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n vÃ  nguá»“n dá»¯ liá»‡u Ä‘á»“ng thá»i giÃºp tÄƒng Ä‘á»™ á»•n Ä‘á»‹nh cá»§a mÃ£ nguá»“n trong tÆ°Æ¡ng lai khi cÃ¡c nguá»“n dá»¯ má»›i Ä‘Æ°á»£c bá»• sung hoáº·c nguá»“n cÅ© háº¿t hiá»‡u lá»±c, báº¡n chá»‰ cáº§n Ä‘á»•i tÃªn nguá»“n Ä‘á»ƒ tiáº¿p tá»¥c sá»­ dá»¥ng.

```
from vnstock import Vnstock
stock = Vnstock().stock(symbol='VCI', source='VCI')
stock.quote.history(start='2020-01-01', end='2024-05-25')
```

### 8.2.2. Náº¡p thÃ´ng qua cÃ¡c class tá»•ng há»£p

Báº¡n chá»n náº¡p má»™t trong cÃ¡c lá»›p chá»©c nÄƒng chÃ­nh. CÃ¡c lá»›p chá»©c nÄƒng nÃ y cho phÃ©p chuyá»ƒn Ä‘á»•i dá»… dÃ ng nguá»“n dá»¯ liá»‡u Ä‘Æ°á»£c há»— trá»£ trong khi giá»¯ nguyÃªn cáº¥u trÃºc hÃ m. Cáº¥u trÃºc nÃ y giÃºp tÄƒng Ä‘á»™ á»•n Ä‘á»‹nh cá»§a mÃ£ nguá»“n trong tÆ°Æ¡ng lai khi cÃ¡c nguá»“n dá»¯ má»›i Ä‘Æ°á»£c bá»• sung hoáº·c nguá»“n cÅ© háº¿t hiá»‡u lá»±c, báº¡n chá»‰ cáº§n Ä‘á»•i tÃªn nguá»“n Ä‘á»ƒ tiáº¿p tá»¥c sá»­ dá»¥ng.

```python
from vnstock import Listing, Quote, Company, Finance, Trading, Screener 
```

### 8.2.3. Náº¡p cÃ¡c lá»›p tÃ­nh nÄƒng riÃªng láº» theo nguá»“n dá»¯ liá»‡u cá»‘ Ä‘á»‹nh

> Báº¡n cáº§n tham kháº£o [mÃ£ nguá»“n](https://github.com/thinh-vu/vnstock/tree/main/vnstock/explorer) Ä‘á»ƒ sá»­ dá»¥ng Ä‘Ãºng cÃ¡c chá»©c nÄƒng cÃ³ sáºµn trong thÆ° viá»‡n.

```python
from vnstock.explorer.vci import Listing, Quote, Company, Finance, Trading
```

hoáº·c 

```python
from vnstock.explorer.tcbs import Quote, Company, Finance, Trading, Screener
```

## 8.3. Danh sÃ¡ch niÃªm yáº¿t

> Danh sÃ¡ch cÃ¡c mÃ£ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n sá»­ dá»¥ng trong viá»‡c thiáº¿t láº­p vÃ²ng láº·p truy xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u tá»« cÃ¡c chá»©c nÄƒng khÃ¡c nhÆ° GiÃ¡ lá»‹ch sá»­, ThÃ´ng tin cÃ´ng ty, BÃ¡o cÃ¡o tÃ i chÃ­nh, vv

```python
from vnstock import Listing
listing = Listing()
listing.all_symbols()
```

## 8.7. GiÃ¡ lá»‹ch sá»­ & thá»‘ng kÃª giao dá»‹ch

### GiÃ¡ lá»‹ch sá»­

```python
from vnstock import Vnstock
stock = Vnstock().stock(symbol='ACB', source='VCI')
stock.quote.history(start='2024-01-01', end='2025-03-19', interval='1D')
```

hoáº·c

```python
from vnstock import Quote
quote = Quote(symbol='ACB', source='VCI')
quote.history(start='2024-01-01', end='2025-03-19', interval='1D')
```

### 8.5. Intraday

> Dá»¯ liá»‡u giao dá»‹ch khá»›p lá»‡nh theo tá»«ng tick

```python
stock.quote.intraday(symbol='ACB', page_size=10_000, show_log=False)
```

Chi tiáº¿t vui lÃ²ng tham kháº£o tÃ i liá»‡u vÃ  Demo Notebook.

## 5.6. Báº£ng giÃ¡ giao dá»‹ch

```python
from vnstock import Trading
Trading(source='VCI').price_board(['VCB','ACB','TCB','BID'])
```

## 8.7. Truy xuáº¥t thÃ´ng tin cÃ´ng ty

```python
from vnstock import Vnstock
company = Vnstock().stock(symbol='ACB', source='VCI').company
company.overview()
```

hoáº·c

```python
from vnstock import Company
company = Company(symbol='ACB', source='VCI')
company.overview()
```

## 8.8. Truy xuáº¥t bÃ¡o cÃ¡o tÃ i chÃ­nh

```python
from vnstock import Vnstock
stock = Vnstock().stock(symbol='VCI', source='VCI')
# Báº£ng cÃ¢n Ä‘á»‘i káº¿ toÃ¡n - nÄƒm
stock.finance.balance_sheet(period='year', lang='vi', dropna=True)
# Báº£ng cÃ¢n Ä‘á»‘i káº¿ toÃ¡n - quÃ½
stock.finance.balance_sheet(period='quarter', lang='en', dropna=True)
# Káº¿t quáº£ hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng kinh doanh
stock.finance.income_statement(period='year', lang='vi', dropna=True)
# LÆ°u chuyá»ƒn tiá»n tá»‡
stock.finance.cash_flow(period='year', dropna=True)
# Chá»‰ sá»‘ tÃ i chÃ­nh
stock.finance.ratio(period='year', lang='vi', dropna=True)
```

## 8.9. Bá»™ lá»c cá»• phiáº¿u

```python
from vnstock import Screener
stock.screener.stock(params={"exchangeName": "HOSE,HNX,UPCOM"}, limit=1700)
```

## 8.10. Dá»¯ liá»‡u quá»¹ má»Ÿ

```python
from vnstock.explorer.fmarket.fund import Fund
fund = Fund()
fund.listing()
```

## 8.11. Dá»¯ liá»‡u thá»‹ trÆ°á»ng quá»‘c táº¿: Cá»• phiáº¿u, FX, Index

```python
from vnstock import Vnstock
fx = Vnstock().fx(symbol='JPYVND', source='MSN')
df = fx.quote.history(start='2025-01-02', end='2025-03-20', interval='1D')
df
```

## 8.12. Tá»· giÃ¡ & giÃ¡ vÃ ng

```python
from vnstock.explorer.misc import *

# Tá»· giÃ¡ ngoáº¡i tá»‡ VCB
vcb_exchange_rate(date='2024-03-21')

# GiÃ¡ vÃ ng SJC
sjc_gold_price()
```

## 8.13. Xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u

> Táº¥t cáº£ dá»¯ liá»‡u tráº£ vá» tá»« Vnstock Ä‘á»u lÃ  Pandas DataFrame hoáº·c Series, do Ä‘Ã³, báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ mÃ´ hÃ¬nh hoÃ¡ cÃ¡c thao tÃ¡c phÃ¢n tÃ­ch cá»§a mÃ¬nh vá»›i lá»‡nh Python dá»… dÃ ng nhá» há»— trá»£ cá»§a AI. Náº¿u cáº§n xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u sang cÃ¡c Ä‘á»‹nh dáº¡ng truyá»n thá»‘ng, báº¡n chá»‰ cáº§n gÃ¡n cÃ¡c hÃ m mÃ´ táº£ á»Ÿ trÃªn vá»›i 1 tÃªn biáº¿n vÃ  thá»±c hiá»‡n xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u nhÆ° dÆ°á»›i Ä‘Ã¢y:

```python
# Biáº¿n ratio_df lÆ°u giÃ¡ trá»‹ cá»§a phÃ©p tÃ­nh vÃ o bá»™ nhá»›
ratio_df = stock.finance.ratio(period='year', lang='vi', dropna=True)

# Xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u ra Excel
ratio_df.to_excel('/nÆ¡i_lÆ°u_file_cá»§a_báº¡n/tÃªn_file-ratio_df.xlsx`, index=False')
# Xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u ra CSV
ratio_df.to_csv('/nÆ¡i_lÆ°u_file_cá»§a_báº¡n/tÃªn_file-ratio_df.csv`, index=False')
```

---

# Vnstock - The Open-Source Stock Analysis Toolkit for Investors in Vietnam

[![Vnstock Homepage](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/thinh-vu/vnstock/refs/heads/main/assets/images/vnstock-hero-banner.png)](https://vnstocks.com/)

<div id="badges" align="center">
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/vnstock?logoColor=brown&style=flat" alt="Version"/>
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/thinh-vu/vnstock?style=flat" alt="Commit Badge"/>
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/license-Custom%20License-red?style=flat" alt="Custom License Badge"/>
</div>

    </a>
    <a href="https://pypi.org/project/vnstock3/">
        <img src="https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/vnstock3?label=vnstock3%20download&style=flat" alt="vnstock3 download badge"/>
    </a>
</div>

---

# ğŸ¤ Introduction to Vnstock

> Welcome to **Vnstock**, a comprehensive open-source solution for stock analysis and investment automation in Vietnam.

Driven by the mission **"To bring financial data and investment tools closer to everyone"**, Vnstock continuously evolves by integrating modern technologiesâ€”not only meeting basic data needs but also empowering you to build flexible, intelligent financial analysis solutions.

### ğŸš€ Why Vnstock?

- **Free & Open-Source**: Accessible for allâ€”investors, analysts, researchers, and educators.
- **Full-Stack Python Support**: Easy-to-use functions for building analysis tools or automated trading bots.
- **Diverse, Continuously Updated Data**: Covers stocks, warrants, indices, futures, bonds, forex, crypto, and more.

You are an important part of the **digital transformation of Vietnamâ€™s financial market**. Letâ€™s create impact together with Vnstock!

### ğŸ¤ Join the Community

Join the Vnstock community to share knowledge, collaborate, and stay updated with the latest features:

<div id="badges" align="center">
  <a href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/vnstock.official" target="_blank">
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Join%20the%20Community-Vnstock-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=facebook" alt="Join Vnstock Community"/>
  </a>
</div>

---

# II. Key Feature Groups

> `Vnstock` reduces time-to-insight by streamlining data processing, enabling learners, researchers, and financial analysts to build their own smart investment solutions. It is more than a data extraction toolâ€”itâ€™s a flexible foundation for personal investing systems.

1. **Easy API Access**  
   Retrieve financial data through simple and intuitive Python functions.

2. **Stock Data**  
   Real-time prices, historical prices, financial indicators, and company profiles for listed stocks.

3. **Stock Screener**  
   Filter stocks based on financial, technical, or market criteria.

4. **Market Indices**  
   Track performance of Vietnamese indices (VNIndex, HNX, UPCOM) and select global indices.

5. **Covered Warrants (CW)**  
   Includes price, expiration, issuers, and market status of warrants.

6. **Precious Metals**  
   Domestic and international gold price updates.

7. **Futures Contracts**  
   Derivatives like VN30F and other trading terms.

8. **Investment Funds (ETF & Mutual Funds)**  
   Portfolio composition, performance, and key metrics.

9. **Bonds**  
   Government and corporate bond data, including yield, maturity, and volume.

10. **Forex**  
    Real-time exchange rates for major currency pairs.

11. **Cryptocurrencies**  
    Prices and market volatility for top cryptocurrencies.

12. **Financial News & Events**  
    Auto-updated financial news, disclosures, and market events calendar.

---

# III. Disclaimer

> **Vnstock** is developed for **personal and research use only**. The provided data may be incomplete, inconsistent, or inaccurate, and should not be used for **live trading, algorithmic strategies, or financial decisions** without proper due diligence.

The authors **disclaim all responsibility** for any loss, damage, or financial risk arising from the use of this library, including but not limited to: data errors, misinterpretation, or misuse.

**Vnstock does not offer investment advice or trading signals**. Users bear full responsibility for how they use this project.

---

# IV. ğŸ”‘ License

`Vnstock` is distributed under a custom license focused on **personal, non-commercial use**. Usage terms are detailed in the [LICENSE](LICENSE.md). For commercial or institutional use, please contact the author for official licensing.

When using Vnstock in your project, you are required to cite the author and project as per the citation guide provided.

  </a>

## 8.1 Installation

Install or upgrade to the latest version of Vnstock via pip:

```bash
pip install -U vnstock
```

You can also install the experimental release from GitHub using the command:

```bash
pip install git+https://github.com/thinh-vu/vnstock.git
```

---

## 8.2 Importing the Library

You can import Vnstock into your Python environment using Jupyter Notebook or any Python console. There are four supported methods:

### 8.2.1. Import via Unified Interface

This is the primary method for loading the library, allowing you to define the data source once and reuse across functions. Ideal for analyzing a single stock with consistent settings:

```python
from vnstock import Vnstock
stock = Vnstock().stock(symbol='VCI', source='VCI')
stock.quote.history(start='2020-01-01', end='2024-05-25')
```

### 8.2.2. Import Main Functional Classes

Load from core modules that support dynamic switching between data providers:

```python
from vnstock import Listing, Quote, Company, Finance, Trading, Screener 
```

### 8.2.3. Import from Specific Data Providers

For advanced users needing fixed data sources. Refer to the [source code](https://github.com/thinh-vu/vnstock/tree/main/vnstock/explorer) for details:

```python
from vnstock.explorer.vci import Listing, Quote, Company, Finance, Trading
```

or

```python
from vnstock.explorer.tcbs import Quote, Company, Finance, Trading, Screener
```

---

## 8.3 Listing Symbols

Used for generating lists of available tickersâ€”essential for batch operations:

```python
from vnstock import Listing
listing = Listing()
listing.all_symbols()
```

---

## 8.4 Historical Prices & Trading Stats

### Historical Prices

```python
from vnstock import Vnstock
stock = Vnstock().stock(symbol='ACB', source='VCI')
stock.quote.history(start='2024-01-01', end='2025-03-19', interval='1D')
```

Or use:

```python
from vnstock import Quote
quote = Quote(symbol='ACB', source='VCI')
quote.history(start='2024-01-01', end='2025-03-19', interval='1D')
```

---

## 8.5 Intraday Tick Data

> Retrieves granular trade data per tick:

```python
stock.quote.intraday(symbol='ACB', page_size=10_000, show_log=False)
```

---

## 8.6 Market Price Board

Get real-time quotes for multiple tickers:

```python
from vnstock import Trading
Trading(source='VCI').price_board(['VCB','ACB','TCB','BID'])
```

---

## 8.7 Company Information

```python
from vnstock import Vnstock
company = Vnstock().stock(symbol='ACB', source='VCI').company
company.overview()
```

Or:

```python
from vnstock import Company
company = Company(symbol='ACB', source='VCI')
company.overview()
```

---

## 8.8 Financial Reports

```python
from vnstock import Vnstock
stock = Vnstock().stock(symbol='VCI', source='VCI')

# Balance Sheet - yearly
stock.finance.balance_sheet(period='year', lang='vi', dropna=True)

# Balance Sheet - quarterly
stock.finance.balance_sheet(period='quarter', lang='en', dropna=True)

# Income Statement
stock.finance.income_statement(period='year', lang='vi', dropna=True)

# Cash Flow
stock.finance.cash_flow(period='year', dropna=True)

# Financial Ratios
stock.finance.ratio(period='year', lang='vi', dropna=True)
```

---

## 8.9 Stock Screener

```python
from vnstock import Screener
stock.screener.stock(params={"exchangeName": "HOSE,HNX,UPCOM"}, limit=1700)
```

---

## 8.10 Mutual Fund Data

```python
from vnstock.explorer.fmarket.fund import Fund
fund = Fund()
fund.listing()
```

---

## 8.11 International Markets: Stocks, FX, Indices

```python
from vnstock import Vnstock
fx = Vnstock().fx(symbol='JPYVND', source='MSN')
df = fx.quote.history(start='2025-01-02', end='2025-03-20', interval='1D')
df
```

---

## 8.12 Exchange Rates & Gold Prices

```python
from vnstock.explorer.misc import *

# VCB exchange rate
vcb_exchange_rate(date='2024-03-21')

# SJC gold price
sjc_gold_price()
```

---

## 8.13 Exporting Data

> All data from Vnstock is returned as Pandas `DataFrame` or `Series`, making it AI-friendly and easy to process or export.

```python
# Save ratio data to memory
ratio_df = stock.finance.ratio(period='year', lang='vi', dropna=True)

# Export to Excel
ratio_df.to_excel('/your_save_path/ratio_df.xlsx', index=False)

# Export to CSV
ratio_df.to_csv('/your_save_path/ratio_df.csv', index=False)
```

- **Háº¡n Cháº¿ Sá»­ Dá»¥ng ThÆ°Æ¡ng Máº¡i**: Sá»­ dá»¥ng Vnstock cho má»¥c Ä‘Ã­ch thÆ°Æ¡ng máº¡i bá»Ÿi báº¥t ká»³ tá»• chá»©c nÃ o lÃ  nghiÃªm cáº¥m. Äiá»u nÃ y bao gá»“m, nhÆ°ng khÃ´ng giá»›i háº¡n, cÃ¡c hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng mÃ  Vnstock trá»±c tiáº¿p hoáº·c giÃ¡n tiáº¿p gÃ³p pháº§n táº¡o ra doanh thu hoáº·c dÃ²ng tiá»n cho má»™t tá»• chá»©c mÃ  khÃ´ng cÃ³ sá»± cháº¥p thuáº­n báº±ng vÄƒn báº£n tá»« tÃ¡c giáº£. Tuy nhiÃªn, viá»‡c sá»­ dá»¥ng Vnstock cho má»¥c Ä‘Ã­ch cÃ¡ nhÃ¢n, bao gá»“m nghiÃªn cá»©u vÃ  chá»‰nh sá»­a, váº«n Ä‘Æ°á»£c phÃ©p miá»…n phÃ­.

- **CÃ¡c Má»¥c ÄÃ­ch Sá»­ Dá»¥ng Bá»‹ Cáº¥m**: Báº¡n khÃ´ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c sá»­ dá»¥ng Vnstock cho cÃ¡c má»¥c Ä‘Ã­ch báº¥t há»£p phÃ¡p, phi Ä‘áº¡o Ä‘á»©c, hoáº·c trÃ¡i vá»›i quy Ä‘á»‹nh phÃ¡p luáº­t hiá»‡n hÃ nh.

- **Tá»« Chá»‘i TrÃ¡ch Nhiá»‡m**: TÃ¡c giáº£ khÃ´ng chá»‹u trÃ¡ch nhiá»‡m cho báº¥t ká»³ thiá»‡t háº¡i, máº¥t mÃ¡t, hoáº·c háº­u quáº£ nÃ o phÃ¡t sinh tá»« viá»‡c sá»­ dá»¥ng thÆ° viá»‡n nÃ y, Ä‘áº·c biá»‡t trong hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng Ä‘áº§u tÆ° hoáº·c báº¥t ká»³ hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng nÃ o cÃ³ rá»§i ro. - **TuÃ¢n Thá»§ Luáº­t PhÃ¡p**: Báº¡n Ä‘á»“ng Ã½ tuÃ¢n thá»§ má»i luáº­t phÃ¡p, quy Ä‘á»‹nh, vÃ  hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n liÃªn quan khi sá»­ dá»¥ng thÆ° viá»‡n nÃ y.

- **Báº£o Máº­t Dá»¯ Liá»‡u**: Vnstock cÃ³ thá»ƒ lÆ°u trá»¯ dá»¯ liá»‡u áº©n danh cá»§a thiáº¿t bá»‹ Ä‘á»ƒ tá»‘i Æ°u tÃ­nh nÄƒng vÃ  cáº£i thiá»‡n hiá»‡u nÄƒng pháº§n má»m. **II. Báº¢N QUYá»€N VÃ€ Sá» Há»®U**

**Sá»­ Dá»¥ng vÃ  PhÃ¢n Phá»‘i KhÃ´ng ÄÆ°á»£c PhÃ©p**: Viá»‡c sao chÃ©p, phÃ¢n phá»‘i, hoáº·c khai thÃ¡c thÆ°Æ¡ng máº¡i Vnstock, hoáº·c báº¥t ká»³ pháº§n nÃ o cá»§a nÃ³ lÃ  khÃ´ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c phÃ©p. Giá»›i háº¡n nÃ y bao gá»“m báº¥t ká»³ hÃ¬nh thá»©c táº¡o ra doanh thu hoáº·c sá»­ dá»¥ng cho tá»• chá»©c mÃ  khÃ´ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c sá»± cho phÃ©p rÃµ rÃ ng cá»§a tÃ¡c giáº£. NgÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng tham gia vÃ o cÃ¡c hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c cho phÃ©p nÃªn tÃ´n trá»ng má»¥c Ä‘Ã­ch cá»§a pháº§n má»m nÃ y nhÆ° má»™t cÃ´ng cá»¥ cho viá»‡c thÃºc Ä‘áº©y phÃ¡t triá»ƒn cÃ¡ nhÃ¢n vÃ  má»¥c Ä‘Ã­ch giÃ¡o dá»¥c, chá»© khÃ´ng pháº£i Ä‘á»ƒ lá»£i dá»¥ng tÃ­nh cháº¥t má»Ÿ cá»§a pháº§n má»m cho má»¥c Ä‘Ã­ch sinh lá»£i trong khi tá»• chá»©c vá»‘n cÃ³ nguá»“n tiá»m lá»±c vá» tÃ i chÃ­nh vÃ  con ngÆ°á»i nhÆ°ng khÃ´ng chia sáº» vá»›i tÃ¡c giáº£ vÃ  Ä‘á»™i ngÅ© phÃ¡t triá»ƒn. Báº±ng cÃ¡ch sá»­ dá»¥ng Vnstock, báº¡n Ä‘á»“ng Ã½ ráº±ng mÃ¬nh sáº½ bá»‹ rÃ ng buá»™c bá»Ÿi cÃ¡c Ä‘iá»u khoáº£n cá»§a Thá»a thuáº­n nÃ y. Náº¿u báº¡n khÃ´ng Ä‘á»“ng Ã½ vá»›i cÃ¡c Ä‘iá»u khoáº£n cá»§a Thá»a thuáº­n nÃ y, vui lÃ²ng khÃ´ng cÃ i Ä‘áº·t hoáº·c sá»­ dá»¥ng Vnstock.

================================================
FILE: run_tests.py
================================================
import unittest
import logging
import os
import sys
from datetime import datetime

# Create results directory inside tests if it does not exist
results_dir = os.path.join('tests', 'results')
if not os.path.exists(results_dir):
    os.makedirs(results_dir)

# Define a custom test runner to log results
class LoggingTestRunner(unittest.TextTestRunner):
    def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
        self.log_filename = kwargs.pop('log_filename', None)
        super().__init__(*args, **kwargs)

    def run(self, test):
        result = super().run(test)
        if self.log_filename:
            with open(self.log_filename, 'a') as log_file:
                for test, err in result.errors:
                    log_file.write(f"ERROR: {test}\n{err}\n")
                for test, err in result.failures:
                    log_file.write(f"FAIL: {test}\n{err}\n")
        return result

def main():
    if len(sys.argv) > 1:
        test_name = sys.argv[1]
    else:
        print("Please provide the test file or test case to run. For example:")
        print("python run_tests.py tests.test_ema")
        print("python run_tests.py tests.test_ema.TestEMA.test_ema_normal_index")
        return

    # Configure logging
    test_file_name = test_name.split('.')[1] if '.' in test_name else test_name
    log_filename = os.path.join(
        results_dir, 
        f'{test_file_name}_results_{datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")}.log'
    )
    logging.basicConfig(
        filename=log_filename,
        level=logging.DEBUG,
        format='%(asctime)s %(levelname)s %(message)s',
        datefmt='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S',
    )

    logging.info(f"Starting test suite {test_name}")
    
    # Run the specified test
    suite = unittest.defaultTestLoader.loadTestsFromName(test_name)
    runner = LoggingTestRunner(verbosity=2, log_filename=log_filename)
    runner.run(suite)
    
    logging.info(f"Test suite {test_name} finished")

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()



================================================

import os
import shutil
import subprocess
from setuptools import setup, find_packages, Command
from setuptools.command.install import install

here = os.path.abspath(os.path.dirname(__file__))
with open(os.path.join(here, "README.md"), "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    long_description = f.read()

setup(
    name="vnstock",
    version="3.2.5",
    description="A beginner-friendly yet powerful Python toolkit for financial analysis and automation â€” built to make modern investing accessible to everyone",
    long_description=long_description,

    packages=find_packages(exclude=["tests*", "docs*"]),
    include_package_data=True,
    package_data={

    },

XMP,CÃ´ng ty Cá»• pháº§n Thá»§y Ä‘iá»‡n XuÃ¢n Minh,Sáº£n xuáº¥t & PhÃ¢n phá»‘i Äiá»‡n,"Äiá»‡n, nÆ°á»›c & xÄƒng dáº§u khÃ­ Ä‘á»‘t",Sáº£n xuáº¥t & PhÃ¢n phá»‘i Äiá»‡n,CT,7000,7500,7530,7535
YBM,CÃ´ng ty Cá»• pháº§n KhoÃ¡ng sáº£n CÃ´ng nghiá»‡p YÃªn BÃ¡i,Khai khoÃ¡ng,TÃ i nguyÃªn CÆ¡ báº£n,Khai khoÃ¡ng,CT,1000,1700,1770,1775

================================================
FILE: dev/cleanup.py
================================================
import os
import shutil
import fnmatch

def delete_dirs(dirs):
    for dir in dirs:
        for root, dirnames, filenames in os.walk('.'):
            for dirname in fnmatch.filter(dirnames, dir):
                dir_path = os.path.join(root, dirname)
                try:
                    shutil.rmtree(dir_path)
                    print(f"Deleted directory: {dir_path}")
                except FileNotFoundError:
                    print(f"Directory not found: {dir_path}")
                except Exception as e:
                    print(f"Error while deleting directory: {dir_path}. Error: {str(e)}")

def delete_files(files):
    for file in files:
        for root, dirnames, filenames in os.walk('.'):
            for filename in fnmatch.filter(filenames, file):
                file_path = os.path.join(root, filename)
                try:
                    os.remove(file_path)
                    print(f"Deleted file: {file_path}")
                except FileNotFoundError:
                    print(f"File not found: {file_path}")
                except Exception as e:
                    print(f"Error while deleting file: {file_path}. Error: {str(e)}")

# List of directories to delete
dirs_to_delete = ["__pycache__", "build", "*.egg-info", "dist"]

# List of files to delete
files_to_delete = ["*.tmp"]

# Delete directories
delete_dirs(dirs_to_delete)

# Delete files
delete_files(files_to_delete)

================================================
FILE: dev/tests_directory_init.py
================================================
import os

def create_directory_structure(base_path, structure):
    for entry, sub_structure in structure.items():
        entry_path = os.path.join(base_path, entry)
        if sub_structure is None:
            # It's a file, create an empty file
            open(entry_path, 'a').close()
        else:
            # It's a directory, create it and its substructure
            os.makedirs(entry_path, exist_ok=True)
            init_file = os.path.join(entry_path, '__init__.py')
            open(init_file, 'a').close()  # Create an empty __init__.py file
            create_directory_structure(entry_path, sub_structure)

# Define the directory structure
directory_structure = {
    'tests': {
        'core': {
            'test_converter.py': None,
            'test_config.py': None,
            'test_utils.py': None,
        },
        'explorer': {
            'misc': {
                'test_gold_price.py': None,
                'test_exchange_rate.py': None,
            },
            'msn': {
                'test_models.py': None,
                'test_quote.py': None,
            },
            'vci': {
                'test_company.py': None,
                'test_analysis.py': None,
                'test_models.py': None,
                'test_quote.py': None,
            },
            'tcbs': {
                'test_company.py': None,
                'test_analysis.py': None,
                'test_models.py': None,
                'test_quote.py': None,
            },
        },
        'common': {
            'test_data_explorer.py': None,
        },
    }
}

# Define the base path for the project
base_path = '/Users/mrthinh/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-Personal/Github/vnstock'

# Create the directory structure
create_directory_structure(base_path, directory_structure)

print("Directory structure created successfully.")

# Jupyter notebook converted to Python script.

"""

"""
# I. CÃ i Ä‘áº·t
"""

"""
## CÃ i Ä‘áº·t thÆ° viá»‡n
"""

!pip install -U vnstock

"""
1. Chá»©ng khoÃ¡n Viá»‡t Nam [táº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y](https://colab.research.google.com/github/thinh-vu/vnstock/blob/main/docs/1_vietnam_stock_vnstock3.ipynb)
2. Chá»©ng khoÃ¡n quá»‘c táº¿: Forex, Crypto, Chá»‰ sá»‘ [táº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y](https://colab.research.google.com/github/thinh-vu/vnstock/blob/main/docs/2_international_market.ipynb)
3. Dá»¯ liá»‡u Thá»‹ trÆ°á»ng, hÃ ng hoÃ¡ [táº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y](https://colab.research.google.com/github/thinh-vu/vnstock/blob/main/docs/3_commodities_vnstock3.ipynb)
4. Biá»ƒu diá»…n dá»¯ liá»‡u trá»±c quan tá»« Vnstock3 [táº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y](https://colab.research.google.com/github/thinh-vu/vnstock/blob/main/docs/5_visualization_data_exploration_vnstock3.ipynb)
"""

"""
## Náº¡p thÆ° viá»‡n láº§n Ä‘áº§u
"""

"""
> Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ náº¡p toÃ n bá»™ cÃ¡c module cá»§a thÆ° viá»‡n vÃ o mÃ´i trÆ°á»ng lÃ m viá»‡c náº¿u chÆ°a biáº¿t rÃµ mÃ¬nh cáº§n gÃ¬ hoáº·c chá»n tá»«ng module riÃªng biá»‡t Ä‘á»ƒ náº¡p vÃ o khi Ä‘Ã£ quen thuá»™c.
"""

## Náº¡p Wrapper lÃ m viá»‡c chÃ­nh (UI chÃ­nh cá»§a thÆ° viá»‡n)
from vnstock import Vnstock

## CÃ³ thá»ƒ gá»i cÃ¡c class chi tiáº¿t trong thÆ° viá»‡n thay vÃ¬ sá»­ dá»¥ng cáº¥p cao nháº¥t lÃ  Vnstock
from vnstock import Listing, Quote, Company, Finance, Trading, Screener 

## Báº¡n cÅ©ng cÃ³ thá»ƒ gá»i cÃ¡c class trong theo vá»‹ trÃ­ chi tiáº¿t cá»§a nguá»“n dá»¯ liá»‡u
from vnstock.explorer.vci import Listing, Quote, Company, Finance, Trading

# hoáº·c

from vnstock.explorer.tcbs import Quote, Company, Finance, Trading, Screener

"""
# II. Truy xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u - CK Viá»‡t Nam
"""

"""
* Khá»Ÿi táº¡o Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng stock Ä‘á»ƒ dÃ¹ng cho táº¥t cáº£ thao tÃ¡c truy xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u chá»©ng khoÃ¡n vá» sau. Luá»“ng cÃ´ng viá»‡c minh hoáº¡ dÆ°á»›i Ä‘Ã¢y giáº£ Ä‘á»‹nh báº¡n báº¯t Ä‘áº§u vá»›i 1 mÃ£ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n cáº§n phÃ¢n tÃ­ch, máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  VN30F1M. Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ thay Ä‘á»•i sang mÃ£ báº¥t ká»³ báº±ng cÃ¡ch nháº­p tham sá»‘ `symbol` táº¡i hÃ m chá»©c nÄƒng thay vÃ¬ khá»Ÿi táº¡o láº¡i Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng. VÃ­ dá»¥, mÃ£ `VN30F1M` Ä‘Æ°á»£c gÃ¡n khi táº¡o Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng, nhÆ°ng khi gá»i dá»¯ liá»‡u giÃ¡ lá»‹ch sá»­, báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ cáº­p nháº­t mÃ£ má»›i lÃ  `ACB` thay vÃ¬ khá»Ÿi táº¡o láº¡i Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng má»™t cÃ¡ch báº¥t tiá»‡n: `stock.quote.history(symbol='ACB', start='2020-01-01', end='2024-12-31')`

* Chá»n nguá»“n dá»¯ liá»‡u thuá»™c danh sÃ¡ch Ä‘Æ°á»£c há»— trá»£: VCI, TCBS cho chá»©ng khoÃ¡n trong nÆ°á»›c, MSN cho dá»¯ liá»‡u chá»©ng khoÃ¡n quá»‘c táº¿ vÃ  sÃ n HOSE.
"""

from vnstock import Vnstock
stock = Vnstock().stock(symbol='ACB', source='VCI')

"""
## Listing: Liá»‡t kÃª danh sÃ¡ch chá»©ng khoÃ¡n
"""

"""
### Danh sÃ¡ch táº¥t cáº£ mÃ£ CK niÃªm yáº¿t (Ä‘Æ¡n giáº£n)
"""

# VCI lÃ  nguá»“n dá»¯ liá»‡u tá»« CK Vietcap bÃªn cáº¡nh nguá»“n tá»« TCBS
stock.listing.all_symbols()

#   152             TÃ i chÃ­nh                Financials     8000      1

#   153             NgÃ¢n hÃ ng                     Banks     8301      1

#   154   CÃ´ng nghá»‡ ThÃ´ng tin                Technology     9000      1

#   

#   [155 rows x 4 columns]

"""
## Quote: GiÃ¡ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n
"""

"""
#### GiÃ¡ lá»‹ch sá»­
"""

"""
##### Cá»• phiáº¿u
"""

df = stock.quote.history(start='2024-01-01', end='2025-03-19', interval='1D')
df

# Táº¥t cáº£ dataframe dá»¯ liá»‡u sáº½ Ä‘Æ°á»£c gÃ¡n thuá»™c tÃ­nh tÃªn vÃ  loáº¡i tÃ i sáº£n tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng
print(f'MÃ£ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n: {df.name}')

"""
#### Intraday: dá»¯ liá»‡u khá»›p lá»‡nh
"""

# Dá»¯ liá»‡u khá»›p lá»‡nh trong ngÃ y giao dá»‹ch realtime hoáº·c ngÃ y gáº§n nháº¥t (ngoÃ i giá» giao dá»‹ch)
stock.quote.intraday(symbol='ACB', page_size=10_000, show_log=False)
# Output:
#                             time  price  volume match_type         id

#   0    2025-05-06 09:15:00+07:00  24.05     300       Sell  293457579

#   1    2025-05-06 09:15:00+07:00  24.05    1500       Sell  293457611

#   2    2025-05-06 09:15:00+07:00  24.05     100       Sell  293457610

#   3    2025-05-06 09:15:00+07:00  24.05     100       Sell  293457609

#   4    2025-05-06 09:15:00+07:00  24.05     100       Sell  293457608

#   ...                        ...    ...     ...        ...        ...

#   3603 2025-05-06 14:45:00+07:00  24.00    1000       Sell  293939231

#   3604 2025-05-06 14:45:00+07:00  24.00     100       Sell  293939230

# BÆ°á»›c giÃ¡ vÃ  khá»‘i lÆ°á»£ng giao dá»‹ch: realtime
stock.quote.price_depth('ACB')
# Output:
#      price acc_volume acc_buy_volume acc_sell_volume acc_undefined_volume

#   0  26200     128800         128800               0                    0

#   1  26150     732200         318600          413600                    0

#   4  26000    3369900         486900         2252400               630600

#   5  25950     404000              0          404000                    0

"""
## Trading: Giao dá»‹ch
"""

"""
### Báº£ng giÃ¡
"""

# II. TÃ¬m kiáº¿m mÃ£ niÃªm yáº¿t Ä‘Æ°á»£c há»— trá»£ bá»Ÿi MSN

"""
# III. Truy xuáº¥t giÃ¡ lá»‹ch sá»­: FX, Crypto, Index
"""

"""
## 3.1. Truy xuáº¥t theo mÃ£ symbol
"""

"""
### Forex
"""

from vnstock import Vnstock
fx = Vnstock().fx(symbol='JPYVND', source='MSN')
df = fx.quote.history(start='2025-01-02', end='2025-03-20', interval='1D')
df.head()
# Output:
#           time    open    high     low   close

#   0 2025-01-02  162.00  162.67  161.19  161.55

#   1 2025-01-03  161.53  162.05  161.25  161.47

#   2 2025-01-06  161.54  162.37  160.58  160.93

#   3 2025-01-07  160.93  161.15  160.02  160.44

#   4 2025-01-08  160.44  160.66  159.97  160.20

"""
### Crypto
"""

crypto = Vnstock().crypto(symbol='BTC', source='MSN')
df = crypto.quote.history(start='2023-01-01', end='2024-12-31', interval='1D')
df.head()
# Output:
#             time          open          high           low         close  \

#   151 2023-01-07  4.300877e+08  4.340605e+08  4.270210e+08  4.330381e+08

"""
### Index
"""

index = Vnstock().world_index(symbol='DJI', source='MSN')

df

## 3.2. Truy xuáº¥t theo id tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng symbol

"""
Trong trÆ°á»ng há»£p mÃ£ symbol báº¡n cáº§n khÃ´ng cÃ³ sáºµn trong danh sÃ¡ch Ä‘Æ°á»£c há»— trá»£, báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ truy xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u theo id cá»§a mÃ£ Ä‘Ã³ Ä‘Æ°á»£c tÃ¬m kiáº¿m á»Ÿ má»¥c `II. TÃ¬m kiáº¿m mÃ£ niÃªm yáº¿t Ä‘Æ°á»£c há»— trá»£ bá»Ÿi MSN`
"""

# avyufr lÃ  symbol_id cá»§a USDEUR
from vnstock.explorer.msn.quote import *

fx = Quote(symbol_id='avyn9c')
fx.history(start='2020-01-01', end='2024-12-31')

## Khá»Ÿi táº¡o Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng

!pip install vnstock

# Gá»i tá»« core module
from vnstock.explorer import Fund
fund = Fund()

# # Gá»i tá»« Vnstock wrapper module - version 3.0.7
# from vnstock import Vnstock
# fund = Vnstock().fund()

"""
## Liá»‡t kÃª danh sÃ¡ch cÃ¡c quá»¹
"""

"""
## TÃ¬m kiáº¿m quá»¹ theo tÃªn viáº¿t táº¯t
"""

# Nháº­p 1 pháº§n tÃªn viáº¿t táº¯t Ä‘á»ƒ lá»c
fund.filter('DC')
# Output:
#      id shortName

#   0  40     VNDCF

#   1  67      DCIP

#   2  62    HDBOND

#   3  27      DCBF

#   4  25      DCDE

"""
## ThÃ´ng tin chi tiáº¿t quá»¹
"""

"""
### TÄƒng trÆ°á»Ÿng NAV
"""

fund.details.nav_report('SSISCA')
# Output:
#   2025-04-22 05:29:38 - vnstock.explorer.fmarket.fund - INFO - Retrieving data for SSISCA

#               date  nav_per_unit short_name

#   0     2017-01-04      14412.31     SSISCA

#   ...          ...           ...        ...

#   1730  2025-04-15      37109.80     SSISCA

#   1733  2025-04-18      36316.72     SSISCA

#   1734  2025-04-21      36529.78     SSISCA

#   

#   [1735 rows x 3 columns]

"""
### Danh má»¥c Ä‘áº§u tÆ° lá»›n (top 10)
"""

fund.details.top_holding('SSISCA')
# Output:
#   2025-04-22 05:29:38 - vnstock.explorer.fmarket.fund - INFO - Retrieving data for SSISCA

#     stock_code                  industry  net_asset_percent type_asset  \

from vnstock import Vnstock
stock = Vnstock().stock(symbol='VN30F1M', source='VCI')
df = stock.quote.history(start='2020-01-01', end='2024-12-31')
# Äáº·t cá»™t 'time' lÃ m cá»™t index
df.set_index('time', inplace=True)
df
# Output:
#   2025-01-02 06:07:40 - vnstock.common.data.data_explorer - WARNING - ThÃ´ng tin niÃªm yáº¿t & giao dá»‹ch sáº½ Ä‘Æ°á»£c truy xuáº¥t tá»« TCBS

stock = Vnstock().stock(symbol='VCI', source='VCI')
income_df = stock.finance.income_statement(period='year', lang='vi', dropna=True)
income_df = income_df.sort_values('NÄƒm', ascending=True)
income_df.set_index('NÄƒm', inplace=True)
income_df

#   2011       33325000                      0  

#   2013       98681819              -16252551  

#   2014     -644037102               40774297

#   2016      299775092             -293094555

#   2021       69316632             -337103544

#   2023      132390105               -3978786  

#   

#   [12 rows x 23 columns]

company = Vnstock().stock(symbol='VCB', source='TCBS').company
shareholders_df = company.shareholders()
# replace share_own_percent in KhÃ¡c row in share_holder column by 100 - sum of other rows
shareholders_df.loc[shareholders_df['share_holder'] == 'KhÃ¡c', 'share_own_percent'] = 1 - shareholders_df['share_own_percent'].sum()
shareholders_df
# Output:
#                     share_holder  share_own_percent

#   0  NgÃ¢n HÃ ng NhÃ  NÆ°á»›c Viá»‡t Nam             0.7480

#   1          Mizuho Bank Limited             0.1500

#   2                         KhÃ¡c             0.0813

profile_df = company.profile()
profile_df
# Output:
#                                           company_name  \

#   0  NgÃ¢n hÃ ng ThÆ°Æ¡ng máº¡i Cá»• pháº§n Ngoáº¡i thÆ°Æ¡ng Viá»‡t...   

#   

#                                        company_profile  \

#   0   NgÃ¢n hÃ ng ThÆ°Æ¡ng máº¡i Cá»• pháº§n Ngoáº¡i thÆ°Æ¡ng Viá»‡...

#                                    business_strategies  

#   0   NgÃ¢n hÃ ng sá»‘ 1 táº¡i Viá»‡t Nam, má»™t trong 100 ng...  

"""
## Biá»ƒu diá»…n xu hÆ°á»›ng
"""

"""
### Time series (Line)
"""

# Váº½ biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ Ä‘Æ¡n giáº£n, sá»­ dá»¥ng tuá»³ chá»n máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh
df['close'].viz.timeseries()
# Output:
#   <Figure size 640x480 with 1 Axes>
#   (<Figure size 640x480 with 1 Axes>, <Axes: xlabel='time'>)

# Má»Ÿ help cho biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ timeseries Ä‘á»ƒ xem táº¥t cáº£ cÃ¡c tuá»³ chá»n
df['close'].viz.timeseries(figsize=(10, 6), 
                           title='GiÃ¡ Ä‘Ã³ng cá»­a - Há»£p Ä‘á»“ng tÆ°Æ¡ng lai VN30F1M', 
                           ylabel='GiÃ¡', 
                           xlabel='Thá»i gian',
                           color_palette='vnstock',
                           palette_shuffle=True)
# Output:
#   <Figure size 1000x600 with 1 Axes>
#   (<Figure size 1000x600 with 1 Axes>,

#    <Axes: title={'center': 'GiÃ¡ Ä‘Ã³ng cá»­a - Há»£p Ä‘á»“ng tÆ°Æ¡ng lai VN30F1M'}, xlabel='Thá»i gian', ylabel='GiÃ¡'>)

df.viz.help('timeseries')
# Output:
#   

#           Biá»ƒu diá»…n dá»¯ liá»‡u theo thá»i gian (timeseries). Dá»¯ liá»‡u cáº§n cÃ³ cá»™t index lÃ  kiá»ƒu dá»¯ liá»‡u datetime.

#   

#           Tham sá»‘:

#               - data (pd.DataFrame hoáº·c pd.Series): Dá»¯ liá»‡u Ä‘áº§u vÃ o dáº¡ng DataFrame hoáº·c Series.

#               - title (str): TiÃªu Ä‘á» cá»§a biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“.

#               - title_fontsize (int): Cá»¡ chá»¯ cho tiÃªu Ä‘á».

#               - xlabel (str): NhÃ£n cho trá»¥c X.

#               - ylabel (str): NhÃ£n cho trá»¥c Y.

#               - color_palette (str): TÃªn cá»§a báº£ng mÃ u Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘á»‹nh trÆ°á»›c hoáº·c danh sÃ¡ch cÃ¡c mÃ u tÃ¹y chá»‰nh. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  'vnstock'. CÃ¡c báº£ng mÃ u cÃ³ sáºµn: 'percentage', 'amount', 'category', 'trend', 'flatui', 'vnstock', 'learn_anything'. CÃ³ thá»ƒ liá»‡t kÃª táº¥t cáº£ báº£ng mÃ u vá»›i Utils.brand_palettes.keys().

#               - palette_shuffle (bool): XÃ¡o trá»™n thá»© tá»± mÃ u sáº¯c trong báº£ng mÃ u, cho phÃ©p chá»n mÃ u ngáº«u nhiÃªn trong báº£ng mÃ u Ä‘á»ƒ biá»ƒu diá»…n cho Ä‘áº¿n khi báº¡n Æ°ng Ã½. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  False.

#               - grid (bool): Hiá»ƒn thá»‹ lÆ°á»›i. Nháº­n True Ä‘á»ƒ hiá»‡n thá»‹ hoáº·c False Ä‘á»ƒ áº©n lÆ°á»›i.

#               - data_labels (bool): Hiá»ƒn thá»‹ nhÃ£n dá»¯ liá»‡u trÃªn biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“.

#               - data_label_format (str): Äá»‹nh dáº¡ng cho nhÃ£n dá»¯ liá»‡u. Nháº­n cÃ¡c giÃ¡ trá»‹ rÃºt gá»n nhÆ° 1K, 1M, 1B, 1T tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng vá»›i 1 ngÃ n, 1 triá»‡u, 1 tá»·, 1 nghÃ¬n tá»·.

#               - label_fontsize (int): Cá»¡ chá»¯ cho nhÃ£n trá»¥c X vÃ  Y.

#               - legend_title (str): TiÃªu Ä‘á» cho chÃº giáº£i.

#               - show_legend (bool): Hiá»ƒn thá»‹ chÃº giáº£i. Nháº­n True Ä‘á»ƒ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ hoáº·c False Ä‘á»ƒ áº©n chÃº giáº£i.

#               - series_names (list): Danh sÃ¡ch tÃªn cho cÃ¡c dáº£i (series) dá»¯ liá»‡u trong biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“. Nháº­n giÃ¡ trá»‹ lÃ  1 danh sÃ¡ch (list).

#               - font_name (str): TÃªn cá»§a font chá»¯ muá»‘n Ã¡p dá»¥ng.

#               - figsize (tuple): KÃ­ch thÆ°á»›c cá»§a biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“, vÃ­ dá»¥ (10, 6).

#               - show_xaxis (bool): Hiá»ƒn thá»‹ trá»¥c X. Nháº­n True Ä‘á»ƒ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ hoáº·c False Ä‘á»ƒ áº©n trá»¥c X.

#               - show_yaxis (bool): Hiá»ƒn thá»‹ trá»¥c Y. Nháº­n True Ä‘á»ƒ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ hoáº·c False Ä‘á»ƒ áº©n trá»¥c Y.

#               - tick_labelsize (int): Cá»¡ chá»¯ cho cÃ¡c nhÃ£n trá»¥c.

#               - xtick_format (str): Äá»‹nh dáº¡ng cho nhÃ£n trá»¥c X. VÃ­ dá»¥ Ä‘á»‹nh dáº¡ng sá»‘ tháº­p phÃ¢n '{:.0f}'.

#               - ytick_format (str): Äá»‹nh dáº¡ng cho nhÃ£n trá»¥c Y. VÃ­ dá»¥ Ä‘á»‹nh dáº¡ng pháº§n trÄƒm '{:.0%}'.

#               - tick_rotation (int): GÃ³c quay cho cÃ¡c nhÃ£n trá»¥c.

#               - xlim (tuple): Giá»›i háº¡n cho trá»¥c X, vÃ­ dá»¥ (0, 100).

#               - ylim (tuple): Giá»›i háº¡n cho trá»¥c Y, vÃ­ dá»¥ (0, 100).

#               - background_color (str): MÃ u ná»n cho biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“.

#               - bar_edge_color (str): MÃ u viá»n cho cÃ¡c cá»™t (bar) trong biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“.

#           


"""
## Combo chart
"""

# Má»Ÿ help cho biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ combo Ä‘á»ƒ xem táº¥t cáº£ cÃ¡c tuá»³ chá»n
df.viz.combo(bar_data='volume',
             line_data='close',
             title='GiÃ¡ Ä‘Ã³ng cá»­a vÃ  khá»‘i lÆ°á»£ng giao dá»‹ch - Há»£p Ä‘á»“ng tÆ°Æ¡ng lai VN30F1M',
             left_ylabel='Volume (M)', right_ylabel='Price (K)',
             figsize=(10, 6),
             color_palette='stock',
             palette_shuffle=True)
# Output:
#   <Figure size 1000x600 with 2 Axes>
#   (<Figure size 1000x600 with 2 Axes>,

#    <Axes: title={'center': 'GiÃ¡ Ä‘Ã³ng cá»­a vÃ  khá»‘i lÆ°á»£ng giao dá»‹ch - Há»£p Ä‘á»“ng tÆ°Æ¡ng lai VN30F1M'}, ylabel='Volume (M)'>,

#    <Axes: title={'center': 'GiÃ¡ Ä‘Ã³ng cá»­a vÃ  khá»‘i lÆ°á»£ng giao dá»‹ch - Há»£p Ä‘á»“ng tÆ°Æ¡ng lai VN30F1M'}, ylabel='Price (K)'>)

"""
## Biá»ƒu diá»…n sá»‘ lÆ°á»£ng
"""

"""
### Table
"""

# Má»Ÿ help cho table Ä‘á»ƒ xem táº¥t cáº£ cÃ¡c tuá»³ chá»n
df.reset_index().iloc[:10, :5]\
    .viz.table(figsize=(10, 10),
               title='10 dÃ²ng Ä‘áº§u tiÃªn cá»§a dá»¯ liá»‡u',
               title_loc='center')
# Output:
#   <Figure size 1000x1000 with 1 Axes>

df.viz.help('table')
# Output:
#   

#               Plot a table using matplotlib.

#               Parameters:

#               

#               data (DataFrame): Dá»¯ liá»‡u cáº§n biá»ƒu diá»…n

#               columns (list, optional): CÃ¡c cá»™t cáº§n hiá»ƒn thá»‹. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  None.

#               title (str, optional): TiÃªu Ä‘á» cá»§a báº£ng. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  "".

#               title_loc (str, optional): TiÃªu Ä‘á» cá»§a báº£ng. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  "left".

#               header (bool, optional): TÃ¹y chá»n hiá»ƒn thá»‹ header - hÃ ng tiÃªu Ä‘á». Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  True.

#               colWidths (list, optional): Chiá»u rá»™ng cá»§a cÃ¡c cá»™t. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  None.

#               rowLoc (str, optional): Vá»‹ trÃ­ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ dá»¯ liá»‡u cá»§a cÃ¡c hÃ ng. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  "right".

#               colLoc (str, optional): Vá»‹ trÃ­ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ dá»¯ liá»‡u cá»§a cÃ¡c cá»™t. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  "right".

#               colLabels (list, optional): TiÃªu Ä‘á» cá»§a cÃ¡c cá»™t. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  None.

#               edges (str, optional): Cáº¡nh cá»§a báº£ng. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  "horizontal".

#               orient (str, optional): HÆ°á»›ng cá»§a báº£ng. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  "horizontal".

#               figsize (tuple, optional): KÃ­ch thÆ°á»›c cá»§a báº£ng. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  (5.5, 6).

#               savefig (str, optional): Äá»‹a chá»‰ lÆ°u file. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  None.

#               show (bool, optional): Hiá»ƒn thá»‹ báº£ng. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  False.

#           


"""
### Barplot
"""

# Má»Ÿ help cho biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ bar Ä‘á»ƒ xem táº¥t cáº£ cÃ¡c tuá»³ chá»n
income_df[['LN trÆ°á»›c thuáº¿', 'Lá»£i nhuáº­n thuáº§n']].div(1000_000_000)\
    .viz.bar(figsize=(10, 6), 
             title='VCI - Lá»£i nhuáº­n trÆ°á»›c thuáº¿ & lá»£i nhuáº­n thuáº§n (tá»· Ä‘á»“ng)', 
             ylabel='Lá»£i nhuáº­n (tá»· Ä‘á»“ng)', 
             xlabel='NÄƒm', 
             color_palette='stock',
             data_labels=False, # Hiá»ƒn thá»‹ giÃ¡ trá»‹ trÃªn cá»™t
             show_legend=True,
             rot=45) # Xoay nhÃ£n trá»¥c x 45 Ä‘á»™
# Output:
#   <Figure size 1000x600 with 1 Axes>
#   (<Figure size 1000x600 with 1 Axes>,

#    <Axes: title={'center': 'VCI - Lá»£i nhuáº­n trÆ°á»›c thuáº¿ & lá»£i nhuáº­n thuáº§n (tá»· Ä‘á»“ng)'}, xlabel='NÄƒm', ylabel='Lá»£i nhuáº­n (tá»· Ä‘á»“ng)'>)

"""
### Heatmap
"""

df['returns'] = df['close'].pct_change() * 100

"""
Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ sá»­ dá»¥ng cÃ¡c tham sá»‘ cÃ i Ä‘áº·t cho Heatmap do Seaborn há»— trá»£ [táº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y](https://seaborn.pydata.org/generated/seaborn.heatmap.html)
"""

# Má»Ÿ help cho biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ heatmap Ä‘á»ƒ xem táº¥t cáº£ cÃ¡c tuá»³ chá»n
import pandas as pd
return_pivot = pd.pivot_table(df, index=df.index.year, columns=df.index.month, values='returns', aggfunc='mean')
cmap = df.viz.create_cmap('percentage') # Táº¡o colormap báº±ng 1 báº£ng mÃ u cÃ³ trong vnstock_ezchart
return_pivot.viz.heatmap(figsize=(10, 6),
                         title='VN30F1M - Thá»‘ng kÃª lá»£i nhuáº­n trung bÃ¬nh theo ngÃ y qua cÃ¡c thÃ¡ng trong nÄƒm (%)',
                         annot=True,
                         cmap=cmap)
# Output:
#   <Figure size 1000x600 with 2 Axes>
#   (<Figure size 1000x600 with 2 Axes>,

#    <Axes: title={'center': 'VN30F1M - Thá»‘ng kÃª lá»£i nhuáº­n trung bÃ¬nh theo ngÃ y qua cÃ¡c thÃ¡ng trong nÄƒm (%)'}, xlabel='time', ylabel='time'>)

df.viz.help('heatmap')
# Output:
#   

#           Biá»ƒu diá»…n dá»¯ liá»‡u dÆ°á»›i dáº¡ng biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ nhiá»‡t (heatmap).

#   

#           Tham sá»‘:

#               - data (pd.DataFrame): Dá»¯ liá»‡u Ä‘áº§u vÃ o dáº¡ng DataFrame.

#               - title (str): TiÃªu Ä‘á» cá»§a biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“.

#               - font_name (str): TÃªn cá»§a font chá»¯ muá»‘n Ã¡p dá»¥ng.

#               - figsize (tuple): KÃ­ch thÆ°á»›c cá»§a biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“, vÃ­ dá»¥ (10, 6).

#               - xlim (tuple): Giá»›i háº¡n cho trá»¥c X, vÃ­ dá»¥ (0, 100).

#               - ylim (tuple): Giá»›i háº¡n cho trá»¥c Y, vÃ­ dá»¥ (0, 100).

#               - title_fontsize (int): Cá»¡ chá»¯ cho tiÃªu Ä‘á».

#               - background_color (str): MÃ u ná»n cho biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“.

#           


"""
## Biá»ƒu diá»…n phÃ¢n phá»‘i
"""

"""
### Histogram
"""

# Má»Ÿ help cho biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ histogram Ä‘á»ƒ xem táº¥t cáº£ cÃ¡c tuá»³ chá»n
df['returns'].viz.hist(bins=20,
                       figsize=(10, 6),
                       title='VN30F1M - PhÃ¢n phá»‘i lá»£i nhuáº­n ngÃ y (%)',
                       xlabel='Lá»£i nhuáº­n (%)',
                       ylabel='Táº§n suáº¥t',
                       color_palette='stock')
# Output:
#   <Figure size 1000x600 with 1 Axes>
#   (<Figure size 1000x600 with 1 Axes>,

#    <Axes: title={'center': 'VN30F1M - PhÃ¢n phá»‘i lá»£i nhuáº­n ngÃ y (%)'}, xlabel='Lá»£i nhuáº­n (%)', ylabel='Táº§n suáº¥t'>)

"""
### Boxplot
"""

# Má»Ÿ help cho biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ boxplot Ä‘á»ƒ xem táº¥t cáº£ cÃ¡c tuá»³ chá»n
df.volume.div(1000_000)\
    .viz.boxplot(
        title='PhÃ¢n phá»‘i khá»‘i lÆ°á»£ng giao dá»‹ch cá»§a VN30F1M', 
        xlabel='', 
        ylabel='KLGD (Triá»‡u CP)', 
        color_palette='stock', 
        palette_shuffle=True,
        figsize=(10, 6))
# Output:
#   No artists with labels found to put in legend.  Note that artists whose label start with an underscore are ignored when legend() is called with no argument.

#   <Figure size 1000x600 with 1 Axes>
#   (<Figure size 1000x600 with 1 Axes>,

#    <Axes: title={'center': 'PhÃ¢n phá»‘i khá»‘i lÆ°á»£ng giao dá»‹ch cá»§a VN30F1M'}, ylabel='KLGD (Triá»‡u CP)'>)

### Wordcloud

                         title='VCB - MÃ´ táº£ cÃ´ng ty',

profile_df

#               - color_palette (str): TÃªn cá»§a báº£ng mÃ u Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘á»‹nh trÆ°á»›c hoáº·c danh sÃ¡ch cÃ¡c mÃ u tÃ¹y chá»‰nh. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  'vnstock'. ### Scatter plot

# Jupyter notebook converted to Python script.

"""

"""

"""
# Má»¥c lá»¥c
"""

"""
1. Chá»©ng khoÃ¡n Viá»‡t Nam [táº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y](https://colab.research.google.com/github/thinh-vu/vnstock/blob/main/docs/1_vietnam_stock_vnstock3.ipynb)
2. Chá»©ng khoÃ¡n quá»‘c táº¿: Forex, Crypto, Chá»‰ sá»‘ [táº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y](https://colab.research.google.com/github/thinh-vu/vnstock/blob/main/docs/2_international_market.ipynb)
3. Dá»¯ liá»‡u Thá»‹ trÆ°á»ng, hÃ ng hoÃ¡ [táº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y](https://colab.research.google.com/github/thinh-vu/vnstock/blob/main/docs/3_commodities_vnstock3.ipynb)
4. Biá»ƒu diá»…n dá»¯ liá»‡u trá»±c quan tá»« Vnstock3 [táº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y](https://colab.research.google.com/github/thinh-vu/vnstock/blob/main/docs/5_visualization_data_exploration_vnstock3.ipynb)
"""

"""
# I. CÃ i Ä‘áº·t
"""

"""
## CÃ i Ä‘áº·t thÆ° viá»‡n
"""

%cd "/workspaces/vnstock"
# Output:
#   /workspaces/vnstock


!pip install -U vnstock

"""
## Náº¡p thÆ° viá»‡n láº§n Ä‘áº§u
"""

"""
> Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ náº¡p toÃ n bá»™ cÃ¡c module cá»§a thÆ° viá»‡n vÃ o mÃ´i trÆ°á»ng lÃ m viá»‡c náº¿u chÆ°a biáº¿t rÃµ mÃ¬nh cáº§n gÃ¬ hoáº·c chá»n tá»«ng module riÃªng biá»‡t Ä‘á»ƒ náº¡p vÃ o khi Ä‘Ã£ quen thuá»™c.
"""

## Náº¡p toÃ n bá»™ thÆ° viá»‡n
# from vnstock import *

## Náº¡p Wrapper lÃ m viá»‡c chÃ­nh (UI chÃ­nh cá»§a thÆ° viá»‡n)
from vnstock import Vnstock

"""
# II. Truy xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u - CK Viá»‡t Nam
"""

"""
* Khá»Ÿi táº¡o Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng stock Ä‘á»ƒ dÃ¹ng cho táº¥t cáº£ thao tÃ¡c truy xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u chá»©ng khoÃ¡n vá» sau. Luá»“ng cÃ´ng viá»‡c minh hoáº¡ dÆ°á»›i Ä‘Ã¢y giáº£ Ä‘á»‹nh báº¡n báº¯t Ä‘áº§u vá»›i 1 mÃ£ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n cáº§n phÃ¢n tÃ­ch, máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  VN30F1M. Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ thay Ä‘á»•i sang mÃ£ báº¥t ká»³ báº±ng cÃ¡ch nháº­p tham sá»‘ `symbol` táº¡i hÃ m chá»©c nÄƒng thay vÃ¬ khá»Ÿi táº¡o láº¡i Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng. VÃ­ dá»¥, mÃ£ `VN30F1M` Ä‘Æ°á»£c gÃ¡n khi táº¡o Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng, nhÆ°ng khi gá»i dá»¯ liá»‡u giÃ¡ lá»‹ch sá»­, báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ cáº­p nháº­t mÃ£ má»›i lÃ  `ACB` thay vÃ¬ khá»Ÿi táº¡o láº¡i Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng má»™t cÃ¡ch báº¥t tiá»‡n: `stock.quote.history(symbol='ACB', start='2020-01-01', end='2024-12-31')`

* Chá»n nguá»“n dá»¯ liá»‡u thuá»™c danh sÃ¡ch Ä‘Æ°á»£c há»— trá»£: VCI, TCBS cho chá»©ng khoÃ¡n trong nÆ°á»›c, MSN cho dá»¯ liá»‡u chá»©ng khoÃ¡n quá»‘c táº¿ vÃ  sÃ n HOSE.
"""

from vnstock import Vnstock
stock = Vnstock().stock(symbol='ACB', source='TCBS')
# Output:
#   2025-05-07 04:07:46 - vnstock.common.data.data_explorer - INFO - TCBS khÃ´ng cung cáº¥p thÃ´ng tin danh sÃ¡ch. Dá»¯ liá»‡u tá»± Ä‘á»™ng tráº£ vá» tá»« VCI.


"""
## Listing: Liá»‡t kÃª danh sÃ¡ch chá»©ng khoÃ¡n
"""

"""
Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ sá»­ dá»¥ng tÃ­nh nÄƒng liá»‡t kÃª danh sÃ¡ch niÃªm yáº¿t cÃ¡c mÃ£ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n tá»« nguá»“n VCI do nguá»“n TCBS khÃ´ng cÃ³ sáºµn dá»¯ liá»‡u tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng. Chi tiáº¿t: [táº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y](https://vnstocks.com/docs/huong-dan/thong-tin-niem-yet)
"""

"""
## Quote: GiÃ¡ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n
"""

"""
#### GiÃ¡ lá»‹ch sá»­
"""

"""
##### Cá»• phiáº¿u
"""

df = stock.quote.history(start='2024-01-01', end='2024-06-21', interval='1D')
df
# Output:
#             time   open   high    low  close    volume

#   0   2023-06-22  18.27  18.40  18.19  18.19   7976555

# Táº¥t cáº£ dataframe dá»¯ liá»‡u sáº½ Ä‘Æ°á»£c gÃ¡n thuá»™c tÃ­nh tÃªn vÃ  loáº¡i tÃ i sáº£n tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng
print(f'MÃ£ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n: {df.name}')
print(f'Loáº¡i tÃ i sáº£n: {df.category}')

#   MÃ£ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n: ACB

# Dá»¯ liá»‡u khá»›p lá»‡nh trong ngÃ y giao dá»‹ch realtime hoáº·c ngÃ y gáº§n nháº¥t (ngoÃ i giá» giao dá»‹ch)

# Output:
#                            time    price  volume match_type

### Báº£ng giÃ¡

"""
## Company: ThÃ´ng tin cÃ´ng ty
"""

from vnstock import Vnstock

company = Vnstock().stock(symbol='VCB', source='TCBS').company
# Output:
#   2025-05-07 04:07:51 - vnstock.common.data.data_explorer - INFO - TCBS khÃ´ng cung cáº¥p thÃ´ng tin danh sÃ¡ch. Dá»¯ liá»‡u tá»± Ä‘á»™ng tráº£ vá» tá»« VCI.


"""
Xem thÃ´ng tin mÃ´ táº£ trÃªn website [táº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y](https://vnstocks.com/docs/huong-dan/bao-cao-tai-chinh#dá»¯-liá»‡u-bÃ¡o-cÃ¡o-tá»«-tcbs)
"""

"""
### Tá»•ng quan
"""

# Bá» .T Ä‘á»ƒ xoay dÃ²ng thÃ nh cá»™t
company.overview().T
# Output:
#                                               0

#   symbol                                    VCB

#   exchange                                 HOSE

#   industry                                Banks

#   company_type                               NH

#   no_shareholders                         25183

#   foreign_percent                         0.224

"""
### Há»“ sÆ¡
"""

# Bá» .T Ä‘á»ƒ xoay dÃ²ng thÃ nh cá»™t
company.profile().T

#                                                                        0

#   symbol                                                             VCB

### Cá»• Ä‘Ã´ng
"""

### Giao dá»‹ch ná»™i bá»™
"""

# Bá» .head() Ä‘á»ƒ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ toÃ n bá»™ dá»¯ liá»‡u

# Output:
#     deal_announce_date       deal_method deal_action  deal_quantity  deal_price  \

#   0         2025-04-14    Cá»• Ä‘Ã´ng ná»™i bá»™         Mua            0.0     59300.0

#   2         2023-12-21    Cá»• Ä‘Ã´ng ná»™i bá»™         Mua         5000.0     54114.0

### CÃ´ng ty con, liÃªn káº¿t
"""

# Bá» .head() Ä‘á»ƒ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ toÃ n bá»™ dá»¯ liá»‡u

### Ban lÃ£nh Ä‘áº¡o
"""

"""
### Sá»± kiá»‡n
"""

# Bá» .head() Ä‘á»ƒ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ toÃ n bá»™ dá»¯ liá»‡u
company.events().head()
# Output:
#       rsi    rs       id    price  price_change  price_change_ratio  \

#   0  39.6  32.0  2590699  57300.0        -200.0              -0.003

#   2  41.8  44.0  2590066  57500.0        -700.0              -0.012

# Jupyter notebook converted to Python script.

"""
<a target="_blank" href="https://colab.research.google.com/github/thinh-vu/vnstock/blob/main/docs/vci/vci_functions_demo.ipynb">
  <img src="https://colab.research.google.com/assets/colab-badge.svg" alt="Open In Colab"/>

"""

"""
# Má»¥c lá»¥c
"""

"""
# I. CÃ i Ä‘áº·t
"""

"""
## CÃ i Ä‘áº·t thÆ° viá»‡n
"""

!pip install -U vnstock

"""
## Náº¡p thÆ° viá»‡n láº§n Ä‘áº§u
"""

"""
> Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ náº¡p toÃ n bá»™ cÃ¡c module cá»§a thÆ° viá»‡n vÃ o mÃ´i trÆ°á»ng lÃ m viá»‡c náº¿u chÆ°a biáº¿t rÃµ mÃ¬nh cáº§n gÃ¬ hoáº·c chá»n tá»«ng module riÃªng biá»‡t Ä‘á»ƒ náº¡p vÃ o khi Ä‘Ã£ quen thuá»™c.
"""

from vnstock.explorer.vci import Listing, Quote, Company, Finance, Trading

"""
# II. Truy xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u - CK Viá»‡t Nam
"""

"""
## Listing: Liá»‡t kÃª danh sÃ¡ch chá»©ng khoÃ¡n
"""

listing = Listing()

"""
### Danh sÃ¡ch táº¥t cáº£ mÃ£ CK niÃªm yáº¿t (Ä‘Æ¡n giáº£n)
"""

# VCI lÃ  nguá»“n dá»¯ liá»‡u tá»« CK Vietcap bÃªn cáº¡nh nguá»“n tá»« TCBS
listing.all_symbols()
# Output:
#        symbol                                         organ_name

#   0       YTC  CÃ´ng ty Cá»• pháº§n Xuáº¥t nháº­p kháº©u Y táº¿ ThÃ nh phá»‘ ...

#   1       YEG                     CÃ´ng ty Cá»• pháº§n Táº­p Ä‘oÃ n Yeah1

"""
## Quote: GiÃ¡ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n
"""

"""
> KhÃ´ng giá»‘ng nhÆ° khi sá»­ dá»¥ng nhÃ³m hÃ m tá»•ng há»£p `Vnstock` nhÆ° cá»•ng giao tiáº¿p vá»›i pháº§n má»m, báº¡n cáº§n Ä‘á»‹nh nghÄ©a thÃ´ng tin `symbol` táº¡i lá»›p `Quote` khi náº¡p chÆ°Æ¡ng trÃ¬nh vÃ  khÃ´ng thá»ƒ sá»­ dá»¥ng tham sá»‘ `symbol` trong cÃ¡c hÃ m thÃ nh pháº§n. Äá»ƒ truy váº¥n cÃ¡c mÃ£ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n khÃ¡c nhau, báº¡n cáº§n khai bÃ¡o táº¡i `Quote`
"""

# # Láº¥y thÃ´ng tin chi tiáº¿t cá»§a má»™t mÃ£ cá»• phiáº¿u, ETF
quote = Quote(symbol='FPT')

# Láº¥y thÃ´ng tin mÃ£ HÄTL
quote = Quote(symbol='VN30F1M')
# hoáº·c
# quote = Quote(symbol='VN30F2506')

# Láº¥y thÃ´ng tin mÃ£ chá»‰ sá»‘
quote = Quote(symbol='VNINDEX')

# Láº¥y thÃ´ng tin mÃ£ chá»©ng quyá»n (CW)
quote = Quote(symbol='CFPT2314')

# ThÃ´ng tin trÃ¡i phiáº¿u niÃªm yáº¿t
quote = Quote(symbol='CII424002')

"""
#### GiÃ¡ lá»‹ch sá»­
"""

df = quote.history(start='2024-01-01', end='2025-03-19', interval='1D')
df
# Output:
#             time    open    high     low   close  volume

#   0   2024-04-11  120.00  139.50  120.00  135.00  186701

#   1   2024-04-12  132.50  135.10  125.00  130.20  111161

#   2   2024-04-15  130.20  130.30  123.00  123.50   61607

#   3   2024-04-16  123.00  123.00  117.00  117.00   31563

#   4   2024-04-17  114.20  119.00  110.90  117.00   11721

#   ..         ...     ...     ...     ...     ...     ...

#   227 2025-03-13  125.90  125.90  125.90  125.90      10

#   228 2025-03-14  125.00  126.00  125.00  126.00    2000

#   229 2025-03-17  126.00  127.00  126.00  127.00    6014

#   230 2025-03-18  127.01  128.50  127.01  128.00    1780

#   231 2025-03-19  127.01  127.01  127.01  127.01   83350

#   

#   [232 rows x 6 columns]

# Táº¥t cáº£ dataframe dá»¯ liá»‡u sáº½ Ä‘Æ°á»£c gÃ¡n thuá»™c tÃ­nh tÃªn vÃ  loáº¡i tÃ i sáº£n tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng
print(f'MÃ£ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n: {df.name}')
print(f'Loáº¡i tÃ i sáº£n: {df.category}')
# Output:
#   MÃ£ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n: VN30F2506

#   Loáº¡i tÃ i sáº£n: derivative


"""
#### Intraday: dá»¯ liá»‡u khá»›p lá»‡nh
"""

# Dá»¯ liá»‡u khá»›p lá»‡nh trong ngÃ y giao dá»‹ch realtime hoáº·c ngÃ y gáº§n nháº¥t (ngoÃ i giá» giao dá»‹ch)
quote.intraday(page_size=10_000, show_log=False)
# Output:
#                             time     price  volume match_type         id

#   0    2025-04-04 10:32:34+07:00  108800.0     200        Buy  285392781

#   1    2025-04-04 10:32:34+07:00  108800.0     500        Buy  285392782

#   2    2025-04-04 10:32:39+07:00  108800.0     200        Buy  285392931

#   3    2025-04-04 10:32:40+07:00  108800.0     400        Buy  285392993

#   4    2025-04-04 10:32:41+07:00  108800.0     200        Buy  285393010

#   ...                        ...       ...     ...        ...        ...

#   9995 2025-04-04 14:29:57+07:00  113900.0     100        Buy  285744581

#   9996 2025-04-04 14:29:58+07:00  113900.0     100        Buy  285744625

#   9997 2025-04-04 14:29:58+07:00  113900.0     200        Buy  285744721

#   9998 2025-04-04 14:29:59+07:00  113900.0     100        Buy  285744754

#   9999 2025-04-04 14:45:01+07:00  113000.0  520100        ATC  285746170

#   

#   [10000 rows x 5 columns]

# BÆ°á»›c giÃ¡ vÃ  khá»‘i lÆ°á»£ng giao dá»‹ch: realtime
quote.price_depth()
# Output:
#        price acc_volume acc_buy_volume acc_sell_volume acc_undefined_volume

#   0   113900        500            500               0                    0

#   1   113800      11700           8600            3100                    0

#   2   113700       8600           5400            3200                    0

#   3   113600      58800           5800           53000                    0

#   4   113500     245200         204400           40800                    0

#   ..     ...        ...            ...             ...                  ...

#   79  106000     767800         299700          468100                    0

#   80  105900     124800          59300           65500                    0

#   81  105800     118100          82900           35200                    0

#   82  105700     375200         178300          196900                    0

#   83  105600    7282900        4692600          772900              1817400

#   

#   [84 rows x 5 columns]

"""
## Trading: Giao dá»‹ch
"""

from vnstock.explorer.vci import Trading
trading = Trading()

"""
### Báº£ng giÃ¡
"""

trading.price_board(['ACB'])
# Output:
#     listing                                                                 \

#      symbol ceiling  floor ref_price stock_type exchange last_trading_date   

#   0     ACB   25800  22500     24150      STOCK      HSX                     

#   

#                                   ...     bid_ask                           \

#   

#                   

#     ask_3_volume  

#   0       263500  

#   

#   [1 rows x 41 columns]

trading.price_board(['VCB','ACB','TCB','BID'], flatten_columns=True, drop_levels=[0]).T # Bá» .T Ä‘á»ƒ xoay trá»Ÿ láº¡i Ä‘Ãºng kiá»ƒu hiá»ƒn thá»‹ báº£ng giÃ¡

"""

## Náº¡p thÆ° viá»‡n láº§n Ä‘áº§u

"""
> Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ náº¡p toÃ n bá»™ cÃ¡c module cá»§a thÆ° viá»‡n vÃ o mÃ´i trÆ°á»ng lÃ m viá»‡c náº¿u chÆ°a biáº¿t rÃµ mÃ¬nh cáº§n gÃ¬ hoáº·c chá»n tá»«ng module riÃªng biá»‡t Ä‘á»ƒ náº¡p vÃ o khi Ä‘Ã£ quen thuá»™c.

"""
# II. Truy xuáº¥t dá»¯ liá»‡u - CK Viá»‡t Nam
"""

"""
* Chá»n nguá»“n dá»¯ liá»‡u thuá»™c danh sÃ¡ch Ä‘Æ°á»£c há»— trá»£: VCI, TCBS cho chá»©ng khoÃ¡n trong nÆ°á»›c, MSN cho dá»¯ liá»‡u chá»©ng khoÃ¡n quá»‘c táº¿ vÃ  sÃ n HOSE.
"""

from vnstock import Listing
listing = Listing(source='vci')

"""
## Listing: Liá»‡t kÃª danh sÃ¡ch chá»©ng khoÃ¡n
"""

"""
### Danh sÃ¡ch táº¥t cáº£ mÃ£ CK niÃªm yáº¿t (Ä‘Æ¡n giáº£n)
"""

# VCI lÃ  nguá»“n dá»¯ liá»‡u tá»« CK Vietcap bÃªn cáº¡nh nguá»“n tá»« TCBS
listing.all_symbols()

"""
### Danh sÃ¡ch cá»• phiáº¿u theo nhÃ³m
"""

# Liá»‡t kÃª táº¥t cáº£ mÃ£ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n theo nhÃ³m phÃ¢n loáº¡i. VÃ­ dá»¥ HOSE, VN30, VNMidCap, VNSmallCap, VNAllShare, VN100, ETF, HNX, HNX30, HNXCon, HNXFin, HNXLCap, HNXMSCap, HNXMan, UPCOM, FU_INDEX (mÃ£ chá»‰ sá»‘ há»£p Ä‘á»“ng tÆ°Æ¡ng lai), CW (chá»©ng quyá»n)
listing.symbols_by_group('VN30')
# Output:
#   0     ACB

#   1     BCM

#   3     BVH

#   4     CTG

### Danh sÃ¡ch mÃ£ ngÃ nh theo mÃ£ icb

#   0                          Sáº£n xuáº¥t Dáº§u khÃ­

"""
## Quote: GiÃ¡ chá»©ng khoÃ¡n
"""

from vnstock import Quote
quote = Quote(source='vci', symbol='ACB')

"""
#### GiÃ¡ lá»‹ch sá»­
"""

"""
##### Cá»• phiáº¿u
"""

df = quote.history(start='2024-01-01', end='2025-03-19', interval='1D')
df

#             time   open   high    low  close    volume

#   0   2024-01-02  20.12  20.79  20.12  20.54  13896933

"""
#### Intraday: dá»¯ liá»‡u khá»›p lá»‡nh
"""

# Dá»¯ liá»‡u khá»›p lá»‡nh trong ngÃ y giao dá»‹ch realtime hoáº·c ngÃ y gáº§n nháº¥t (ngoÃ i giá» giao dá»‹ch)
quote.intraday(symbol='ACB', page_size=10_000, show_log=False)
# Output:
#                             time    price  volume match_type         id

#   0    2025-04-21 09:15:02+07:00  24350.0  126900        ATO  290094501

#   1    2025-04-21 09:15:03+07:00  24450.0     200        Buy  290094785

#   2    2025-04-21 09:15:17+07:00  24400.0     100        Buy  290095319

#   3    2025-04-21 09:15:28+07:00  24350.0    5000       Sell  290095713

#   4    2025-04-21 09:15:28+07:00  24350.0     500       Sell  290095712

#   ...                        ...      ...     ...        ...        ...

#   3598 2025-04-21 14:29:44+07:00  24150.0     200       Sell  290500245

#   3599 2025-04-21 14:29:44+07:00  24150.0    7600       Sell  290500246

#   3600 2025-04-21 14:29:45+07:00  24200.0    1400        Buy  290500325

#   3601 2025-04-21 14:29:45+07:00  24200.0     100        Buy  290500324

#   3602 2025-04-21 14:45:02+07:00  24100.0  462500        ATC  290501644

#   

#   [3603 rows x 5 columns]

# BÆ°á»›c giÃ¡ vÃ  khá»‘i lÆ°á»£ng giao dá»‹ch: realtime
quote.price_depth('ACB')
# Output:
#      price acc_volume acc_buy_volume acc_sell_volume acc_undefined_volume

#   0  24500      53800          53800               0                    0

#   1  24450     391600         130000          261600                    0

#   2  24400     398000          23600          374400                    0

#   3  24350     422500          45400          250200               126900

#   4  24300     591500         314300          277200                    0

#   5  24250    2112900        1435700          677200                    0

#   6  24200    1964800         476500         1488300                    0

#   7  24150     836900           5400          831500                    0

#   8  24100     474000              0           11500               462500

"""
## Trading: Giao dá»‹ch
"""

from vnstock import Trading
trading = Trading(symbol='ACB', source='vci')

"""
### Báº£ng giÃ¡
"""

trading.price_board(['ACB'])
# Output:
#     listing                                                                 \

#      symbol ceiling  floor ref_price stock_type exchange last_trading_date

#     ask_3_volume

FILE: tests/plan.md

## Test Plan for `vnstock` Explorer Modules

### 1. Introduction

This document outlines the test plan for the `explorer/` directory of the `vnstock` Python package. It defines objectives, scope, testing phases, structure, execution strategy, and CI integration.

### 2. Objectives

* **1\_smoke (Phase 1)**: Verify all public explorer APIs import, instantiate, and return a `pandas.DataFrame` without errors.
* **2\_functional (Phase 2)**: Validate parsing logic, column names, dtypes, and business rules against representative fixtures.
* **3\_edge (Phase 3)**: Cover empty responses, malformed payloads, HTTP errors, timeouts, and boundary conditions.
* **4\_scenarios (Phase 4)**: Simulate real usage by combining multiple classes and methods, mixing data sources, and end-to-end scenario workflows.
* **5\_performance (Phase 5)**: Benchmark parsing speed, memory usage, and built-in rate-limit handling for large-batch operations.
* **6\_regression (Phase 6)**: Prevent recurrence of specific, previously fixed bugs with dedicated test cases.
* Achieve at least **90% code coverage** on the `explorer/` directory.
* Generate test results and coverage reports under `tests/report/` for CI consumption.

### 3. Scope Scope

**In scope:**

* All modules under `vnstock/explorer/`:

  * `fmarket/const.py`, `fmarket/fund.py`
  * `misc/exchange_rate.py`, `misc/gold_price.py`
  * `msn/const.py`, `msn/helper.py`, `msn/listing.py`, `msn/models.py`, `msn/quote.py`
  * `tcbs/quote.py`, `tcbs/screener.py`, `tcbs/trading.py`
  * `vci/analysis.py`, `vci/company.py`, `vci/const.py`, `vci/financial.py`, `vci/listing.py`, `vci/models.py`, `vci/quote.py`, `vci/trading.py`

**Out of scope:**

* Core utilities outside the explorer directory.
* Live API integration beyond Phase 4 tests.

### 4. Test Phases & Directory Structure

```
tests/
â”œâ”€â”€ fixtures/                   # Sample API payloads for Phase 2+3
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ fmarket_fund.json
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ exchange_rate.json
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ gold_price.json
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ ...
â”œâ”€â”€ report/                     # Test results & coverage outputs
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ junit-results.xml
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ coverage.xml
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ coverage_html/
â””â”€â”€ test_explorer/
    â”œâ”€â”€ 1_smoke/                # Phase 1: Smoke tests
    â”‚   â””â”€â”€ test_smoke.py
    â”œâ”€â”€ 2_functional/           # Phase 2: Functional correctness
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_fmarket_fund.py
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_misc_exchange_rate.py
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_misc_gold_price.py
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_msn_listing.py
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_msn_quote.py
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_tcbs_quote.py
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_tcbs_screener.py
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_tcbs_trading.py
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_vci_listing.py
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_vci_quote.py
    â”‚   â””â”€â”€ ...
    â”œâ”€â”€ 3_edge/                 # Phase 3: Edge-case & error handling
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_empty_payloads.py
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_malformed_json.py
    â”‚   â””â”€â”€ test_http_error_codes.py
    â”œâ”€â”€ 4_integration/          # Phase 4: Live/staging integration tests
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test_live_msn_listing.py
    â”‚   â””â”€â”€ ...
    â”œâ”€â”€ 5_performance/          # Phase 5: Performance benchmarks
    â”‚   â””â”€â”€ test_parsing_speed.py
    â””â”€â”€ 6_regression/           # Phase 6: Regression tests for fixed bugs
        â”œâ”€â”€ test_bug_1234_fix.py
        â””â”€â”€ ...
```

### 5. Phase Descriptions

* **Phase 1: Smoke Tests**

  * **Objective:** Quickly catch broken imports, missing signatures, or runtime errors.
  * **Implementation:** Parametrized pytest in `1_smoke/test_smoke.py` that monkeypatches HTTP calls to return minimal responses and asserts a `DataFrame` is returned.

* **Phase 2: Functional Tests**

  * **Objective:** Verify correct data extraction, column names, dtypes, and business logic.
  * **Implementation:** Module-specific tests under `2_functional/` using fixtures in `fixtures/` and monkeypatched HTTP clients.

* **Phase 3: Edge-Case Tests**

  * **Objective:** Ensure modules handle empty responses, malformed data, timeouts, and non-200 HTTP codes gracefully.
  * **Implementation:** Dedicated tests in `3_edge/` feeding edge-case fixtures and asserting appropriate fallback or exceptions.

* **Phase 4: Scenario Combination Tests**

  * **Objective:** Simulate real usage by combining multiple classes and methods, mixing data sources, and exercising overlapping functionality (e.g., initializing different explorer classes in sequence, chaining methods, or mixing responses from multiple sources).
  * **Implementation:** Tests in `4_integration/` (renamed to reflect scenario tests) that:

    * Instantiate several explorer classes in one test.
    * Monkeypatch different fixtures per class to verify isolation and composition.
    * Use parametrization to run cross-class workflows (e.g., fetch listing then quote then trading history for same symbol).

* **Phase 5: Performance & Rate-Limit Tests**

  * **Objective:** Detect regressions in parsing speed, memory usage, and built-in rate-limit handling when processing large batches (hundreds to thousands of symbols).
  * **Implementation:** Tests in `5_performance/` that use `pytest-benchmark` or manual timing to:

    * Request intraday or history data for 100+ symbols in parallel or sequentially.
    * Assert average per-request latency stays below threshold.
    * Simulate rate-limit responses (e.g., HTTP 429) and verify package backoff or retry behavior.

* **Phase 6: Regression Tests**

  * **Objective:** Prevent recurrence of specific, previously fixed bugs.
  * **Implementation:** One-off test files in `6_regression/` that replicate bug conditions and assert correct behavior.

### 6. Test Execution & Reporting Test Execution & Reporting

* **Run all tests:**

  ```bash
  pytest --maxfail=1 --disable-warnings -q
  ```
* **JUnit report:**

  ```bash
  pytest --junitxml=tests/report/junit-results.xml
  ```
* **Coverage reports:**

  ```bash
  pytest --cov=vnstock/explorer \
         --cov-report=html:tests/report/coverage_html \
         --cov-report=xml:tests/report/coverage.xml
  ```

### 7. Continuous Integration

1. **Install dependencies** including `pytest`, `pytest-cov`, `pytest-benchmark`.
2. **Run Phases**: You can split jobs by folder (e.g., smoke first), or run all together.
3. **Fail fast** on smoke failures or coverage below threshold.
4. **Publish** badges and archive reports.

### 8. Execute the tests

#### Install package from source

```bash
python3.10 -m pip install .
```

#### 1. Smoke Tests

```bash
python3.10 -m pytest tests/test_explorer/1_smoke --maxfail=1 -q
```

#### 2. Functional Tests

```bash
python3.10 -m pytest tests/test_explorer/2_functional --maxfail=1 -q
```


================================================
FILE: tests/archived/README.md
================================================
## Running the Script with Arguments
To run the entire test_quote.py file:

```sh
python3 run_tests.py tests.common.test_data_explorer
```
To run a specific test case within test_quote.py:

```sh
python3 run_tests.py tests.common.test_data_explorer.TestVnstock.test_vnstock_init_invalid_source
```
This custom script provides flexibility to run specific tests efficiently without modifying the script each time.

## Real examples

- Fmarket fund testing: `python3.10 -m unittest tests.explorer.fmarket.test_fund`


================================================
FILE: tests/archived/__init__.py
================================================



================================================
FILE: tests/archived/config.py
================================================
import pandas as pd
from datetime import datetime
import logging

# Define logger and set logging template
logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
logging.basicConfig(format='%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s', level=logging.INFO)

class TestData:
    start_date: str
    end_date: str

    def __init__(self, start_date: str = '2019-01-02', end_date: str = None):
        self.start_date = start_date
        self.end_date = end_date if end_date else datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')
        
        self.stocks = [
            'ACB', 'BCM', 'BID', 'BVH', 'CTG', 'FPT', 'GAS', 'GVR', 'HDB', 'HPG',
            'MBB', 'MSN', 'MWG', 'PLX', 'POW', 'SAB', 'SHB', 'SSB', 'SSI', 'STB',
            'TCB', 'TPB', 'VCB', 'VHM', 'VIB', 'VIC', 'VJC', 'VNM', 'VPB', 'VRE'
        ]
        
        self.indices = ['VNINDEX', 'HNXINDEX', 'UPCOMINDEX']
        
        self.group_codes = [
            'HOSE', 'VN30', 'VNMidCap', 'VNSmallCap', 'VNAllShare', 'VN100', 'ETF',
            'HNX', 'HNX30', 'HNXCon', 'HNXFin', 'HNXLCap', 'HNXMSCap', 'HNXMan', 'UPCOM', 'FU_INDEX'
        ]
        
        self.etfs = [
            "E1VFVN30", "FUEBFVND", "FUEDCMID", "FUEFCV50", "FUEIP100", "FUEKIV30",
            "FUEKIVFS", "FUEKIVND", "FUEMAV30", "FUEMAVND", "FUESSV30", "FUESSV50",
            "FUESSVFL", "FUEVFVND", "FUEVN100"
        ]
        
        self.cw = [
            'CACB2304', 'CACB2305', 'CACB2306', 'CACB2307', 'CACB2401', 'CFPT2310',
            'CFPT2313', 'CFPT2314', 'CFPT2316', 'CFPT2317', 'CFPT2318', 'CHDB2306',
            'CHPG2315', 'CHPG2316', 'CHPG2319', 'CHPG2322', 'CHPG2329', 'CHPG2331',
            'CHPG2332', 'CHPG2333'
        ]
        
        self.futures = [
            'VN30F2406', 'VN30F2407', 'VN30F2409', 'VN30F2412'
        ]

================================================
FILE: tests/archived/common/test_data_explorer.py
